feed.title: MetaFilter Deleted Posts

entry.title: Slate Star Codex and Silicon Valley’s War Against the Media

link.title: Slate Star Codex and Silicon Valley’s War Against the Media

entry.content:
Post 187930 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: While the general topic of anonymity online is a subject we can productively address, an essay valorizing a site known for (among other things) using the humanity of transgender people as an abstract topic for debate is definitely not going to work here. -- taz
entry.summary: Post 187930 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: While the general topic of anonymity online is a subject we can productively address, an essay valorizing a site known for (among other things) using the humanity of transgender people as an abstract topic for debate is definitely not going to work here. -- taz

entry.title: It’s political correctness gone mad!
entry.content:
Post 187843 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: We deleted this once already earlier; the Harper's piece sucks, like these pieces always suck, and while I get the instinct to want to highlight and note how sucky the sucky stuff is I think we'd be better off just not giving it extra attention. -- cortex
